name: Christmas Kitten Chaos
description:
This Christmas, Frankie and Philly the kittens can run riot about the whole house, scoring points by taking out decorations, presents and household items. Find out where the funny little intruders that keep bringing in the presents are coming from and follow them back there. You might need to find some items to help you.

Press left to play as Frankie or right to play as Philly.

For a two player game with both kittens press X.

Chain together destruction while the combo indicator shows to score more points.

Controls Player 1

Swipe/Hit: X, V, M (X on gamepad)

Jump: Up Arrow, Z, C, N (A on gamepad)

Left - Right: Left Arrow - Right Arrow

Drop down: Down Arrow

Player 2

Swipe/Hit: Q (X on gamepad)

Jump: E, Tab, W (A on gamepad)

Left - Right: A - D

Drop down: S 

Menu: P, Enter, Esc

From the menu you can toggle the music.

(These are the usual PICO-8 controls)

Merry Christmas!

If you like this game, find a problem or have any suggestions then please comment below.

Please consider trying my other games or following me for news on new projects. Particularly, you might enjoy Demystifying the Christmas Tree, last year's Christmas game with Frankie and Philly.

Game programming, art, music: Drake Blue Games using PICO-8 by Lexaloffle
